snippet.title: New 2020 - The Lighthouse Of Sao Bento Do Oeste (Sega Saturn)
snippet.description:
A new homebrew for Sega Saturn in 2020. The lighthouse of sao bento do oeste is a graphic novel and has just been released by Gabriel Sansigolo.

Developer game description - Detective Renne Bras travels to the small town of São Bento do Oeste to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a couple at the city’s lighthouse. Submitted in this 2020's Jogabilidade game jam (#Geleiabilidade) The theme of the jam was "Mystery" and "Break-ups". 

In the game you travel from area to area and try to solve the mystery by questioning suspects. The player can choose at certain points which question to ask the suspects. If you ask the wrong questions you run out of leads and its game over. Ask the correct questions to solve the mystery.

*** The footage used for this video is from real Sega Saturn hardware. However, the music has been added for this video and is not representative of the game***

For more info and to download the game:
https://neuromage.itch.io/lighthouse?fbclid=IwAR3OPTYBm45L6aHg_aPVQ694EXpL24_N8jvl2EJGSpN9__jEleTE3Zvt26w
